definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: When an object pops up, the mirror will reflect it and when it disappears, there will be nothing in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 應該像佛菩薩的大圓鏡智，物來則顯，物去則空。

sentences.english: Scientists explain the boulders as septarian concretions formed about 65 million years ago.
sentences.chinese: 科學家認爲這些大圓石形成於六千五百萬年前。

sentences.english: I will write the Gatha you requested.
sentences.chinese: 我將寫您所提請的普賢大圓滿偈。

sentences.english: The limitation of the great circle theory is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文還討論了“大圓路徑理論”的侷限性。

sentences.english: His is buried in Green River Cemetery and a large boulder marks the spot.
sentences.chinese: 他被葬於綠河公墓中，用一塊大圓石作爲他的墓碑。

sentences.english: Rinse the lettuce leaves and cut them round. Chill them for use.
sentences.chinese: 沖洗生菜葉，修剪成大圓塊，雪凍備用。

sentences.english: There are boulders to stumble on.
He found her weaving around shrubs and boulders.
sentences.chinese: 他看見它在灌木叢和大圓石間穿梭。

sentences.english: One time she went to Riwoche to teach the Dzogchen Nang Jang.
sentences.chinese: 一次，她到類烏齊傳授大圓滿立斷教授《淨治明相》。

sentences.english: Die:A single piece of semiconductor material that has been cut from a slice by scribing and breaking.
sentences.chinese: 硅晶圓大圓片上切割而成的一個小片半導體材料。

sentences.english: Located in the Golden Sword road of big round Shozo and Church Art Museum officially opened.
sentences.chinese: 地處金劍路的大圓祥三和堂畫館正式開館。

sentences.english: You have been sent through the great circle .
sentences.chinese: 你們已經被大圓門送來了。

sentences.english: He found her 21)weaving around shrubs and boulders.
sentences.chinese: 他看見它在灌木叢和大圓石間穿梭。

sentences.english: Can you draw a centrifugal circle in the big circle on this paper?
sentences.chinese: 你能在這張紙上的大圓裏畫個離心園嗎？

sentences.english: Slice the fresh tomato into 4 pieces.
sentences.chinese: 新鮮的蕃茄，切下4個大圓片。

sentences.english: The entering sites of axillaris nerve are all above the distal rim of the larger round muscle.
sentences.chinese: 腋神經入肌部位在大圓肌下緣以上發出。

definition: cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
